attributes.action: Reward drivers for keeping their license clean by reducing their road tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One third reduction for 10 years,
Two thirds reduction for 20 years,
Free of road tax after thirty years with a clean license. To be funded from
speeding fines, bad driving fines etc.
The qualifying periods must be continuous and be revoked on any offence.
